title: Coke Sprite And Fantasy - On The Rocks
description: Coke Sprite and Fantasy is a collection of poetry and is categorized into four parts; Coke, Sprite, Rocks, and Fantasy.This book depicts the emotion of sorrow written in Coke (black), the emotion of purity written in Sprite (transparent), the emotion of reality written in Rocks (uneven), and the emotion of craving written in Fantasy (dreams). CSAF portrays different emotions a teenager and a young adult go through in their lives. "I used to look at peopleAnd wonder about their storiesNow, I look at themAnd find my storyIn each one of them"
author: Anamika Kaur
